articles.title: Top news of the day: Former Supreme Court judge Sudershan Reddy is Opposition's V-P candidate; India announces Asia Cup 2025 squad, Suryakumar Yadav named captain, and more
articles.description: The INDIA bloc has decided to commonly field retired Supreme Court judge B. Sudershan Reddy as the candidate for the upcoming Vice-President elections. India also announced its Asia Cup 2025 squad, with Suryakumar Yadav named captain and Shubman Gill as vice-captain.

articles.title: Hurricane Erin churns off Florida coast, prompting evacuations
articles.description: Hurricane Erin, a Category 2 storm, is moving up the Atlantic coastline, expected to produce life-threatening surf and rip currents from Florida to Canada. Tropical storm and storm surge warnings are in effect for parts of North Carolina's Outer Banks, with some areas ordering evacuations.

articles.title: President Trump pushes for direct talks between Russia and Ukraine
articles.description: President Trump is advocating for direct talks between Russian President Vladimir Putin and Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy, offering security guarantees for Ukraine but ruling out U.S. troops on the ground. The White House is pressing Russia for these talks amidst ongoing conflict.
